RelatedSentence: WORCESTER - Nicolas Dutan Guaman has been sentenced to 12 to 14 years in prison after a Worcester Superior Judge found him guilty of manslaughter by motor vehicle and motor vehicle homicide while driving under the influence of alcohol in the 2011 death of Milford resident Matthew Denice .

A0: Worcester Superior Court Judge David Ricciardone
